/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their facades painted in shades of white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and blue. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the panoramic view.
